card_text: Send 1 card from your hand to the GY and activate 2 of these effects, in sequence;$N●Add 1 "Reptilianne" monster from your Deck to your hand.$N●Add 1 "Reptilianne" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Reptilianne Ramifications".$N●Change the ATK of 1 monster your opponent controls to 0.$NYou can only activate 1 "Reptilianne Ramifications" per turn.
